ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bow for bards!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No. That only works for matched ammo types. It won t pull even arrows with different damage/delay that what is in the range slot. ... I know. Windsong is
ygData.messageBody:
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jeff Heskett [mailto:tarkin@...]
>Sent: Monday, May 08, 2000 6:07 PM

>can you put this arrow in the ammo slot and keep normal ones in inventory?

>on my monk at least, the last ammo is never taken. if it's down to 1 on
>ammo it starts pulling from inventory. of course, i only have shurikens on
>my monk so i don't know how mis-matched ammo types would work.

No. That only works for matched ammo types. It won't pull even arrows with
different
damage/delay that what is in the range slot.

>i know, we have ranged songs, but when i tag something to pull i want it to
>come NOW instead of when the song finally starts :)

I know. Windsong is always bugging me why I use shurikens to pull
(as my bard) and not bellow. Waiting for the song to start is
too long for me.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...

Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
